participant_1.background:
I like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days.
I would love to have lunch with my geocaching friends and share our adventures.
i have brown hair.
I like to travel and document my experiences on my blog.
my nails are painted green.

participant_2.background:
I'm afraid of coming out to my parents because they might not be accepting.
I sometimes forget to walk my dogs, which I know is not good for them.
i read tons of books.
people don t like me too much but i like them anyways.
My favorite TV shows are ones that make me laugh and forget about my troubles.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
Not bad, but a bit bored. What are you up to?
I am thinking about what I want to do today. I am trying to decide between a few options.
What are you thinking of doing?
Well, I could stay in and cuddle with my dog, or I could go for a walk. I could also go visit my family.
I like the idea of staying in and cuddling with your dog. I wish I had a dog to cuddle with.
You should get a dog! They are the best companions.
I know, I know. I've been thinking about it for a while.
Well, if you do decide to get a dog, I would love to meet them.
You're welcome to come over and meet my dogs anytime.
That sounds great! Thanks for the offer.
I think I'm going to stay in and cuddle with my dog today. It's raining outside, and I don't feel like going out.
That sounds like a good plan. I'm going to read a book and watch some TV.
Sounds like a great way to spend a day
